document.docAuthor: Malagón-Aldana, Leonardo A., Smith, David R., Vilhelmsen, Lars & Serna, Francisco
document.masterDocTitle: The sawflies and woodwasps (Hymenoptera: ‘ Symphyta’) of Colombia

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The sawflies and woodwasps (Hymenoptera: ‘ Symphyta’) of Colombia

subSubSection.paragraph:

( Fig. 12h ): Costa Rica , Guatemala , Panama , Suriname (
Smith et al. 2013
), COLOM- BIA. Cundinamarca , San Francisco de Sales , 1520m , 4°58’N , 74°17’W , 20 June 1997 , Medina leg., 1 ♀ , (UNAB 726). Quindío ,

m, 4°36’N , 75°45’W , 06 November 2009 , leg., 1 ♂ , (CAUD).

( Lomariopsidaceae ) in Costa Rica (

Dochmioglene suppar ( Konow, 1903 )
n. comb.
(Fig. 13f): Peru ( Konow, 1903 ), COLOMBIA .
Antioquia
, La Estrella , 2264m , 6°10’N , 75°40’W , 01 May 1985 , B. Urrego leg., 1 ♀ , (MEFLG).
Caquetá
, Florencia , Vda. La Viciosa, Centro de Investigaciones amazónicas Macagual, 370m , 1°30’39”N , 75°40’01”W , hand collecting, 28 September 2016 , J. Díaz-Sánchez y L. Malagón leg., 3 ♀ 2 ♂ , (UNAB 3977).

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Stromboceros suppar
Konow, 1903: 150
;
Konow 1905: 99
;
Oehlke and Wudowenz 1984: 414
.

paragraph.materialsCitation:
Konow described this species from both sexes but did not designate a holotype and did not state how many specimens he examined. One male and one female labelled “TYPUS” are at SDEI. Oehlke and Wudowenz (1894) indicated that syntypes were at SDEI. The female labelled “Marcapata, Peru ,” “ Coll. Konow ,” “TYPUS” is hereby designated the
Lectotype
. The male from “Vilcanota, Peru ” may not be part of the type series, even though labelled “TYPUS” since Konow did not mention this locality.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Host: We reared some larvae feeding on the fern
Asplenium auritum
(Aspieniaceae) in Caquetá , Colombia .

Comments: The Lectotype specimen lacks the pink coloration on upper episternum and tegula. We found that after several hours of rinsing the specimen in ethanol the pink color changed to white. To conserve the pink coloration it is necessary to rinse it in ethanol only for a few minutes before it is pinned.
